00026 void allocategradSlaterDet(gradSlaterDet* G, int A)
00027 {
00028   G->gradval = malloc(MAXNG*A*sizeof(gradGaussian));
00029 }
00030 
00031 void initgradSlaterDet(const SlaterDet* Q, gradSlaterDet* G)
00032 {
00033   G->ngauss = Q->ngauss;
00034   G->gradval = (gradGaussian*) malloc(MAXNG*Q->A*sizeof(gradGaussian));
00035   zerogradSlaterDet(G);
00036 }
00037 
00038 void freegradSlaterDet(gradSlaterDet* G)
00039 {
00040   free(G->gradval);
00041 }
00042 
00043 
00044 void zerogradSlaterDet(gradSlaterDet* G)
00045 {
00046   int i;
00047 
00048   G->val = 0.0;
00049   for (i=0; i<G->ngauss; i++)
00050     zerogradGaussian(&G->gradval[i]);
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 void copygradSlaterDet(const gradSlaterDet* G, gradSlaterDet* Gp)
00055 {
00056   assert(G->ngauss == Gp->ngauss);
00057 
00058   int i;
00059 
00060   Gp->val = G->val;
00061   for (i=0; i<G->ngauss; i++)
00062     Gp->gradval[i] = G->gradval[i];
00063 }
00064 
00065 
00066 void multgradSlaterDet(gradSlaterDet* G, complex double x)
00067 {
00068   int i;
00069 
00070   G->val *= x;
00071   for (i=0; i<G->ngauss; i++)
00072     multgradGaussian(&G->gradval[i], x);
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00076 void addtogradSlaterDet(gradSlaterDet* G, const gradSlaterDet* dG)
00077 {
00078   int i;
00079 
00080   G->val += dG->val;
00081   for (i=0; i<G->ngauss; i++)
00082     addtogradGaussian(&G->gradval[i], &dG->gradval[i]);
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 void addmulttogradSlaterDet(gradSlaterDet* G, const gradSlaterDet* dG, 
00087                             complex double x)
00088 {
00089   int i;
00090 
00091   G->val += x*dG->val;
00092   for (i=0; i<G->ngauss; i++)
00093     addmulttogradGaussian(&G->gradval[i], &dG->gradval[i], x);
00094 }

00096 
00097 void rotategradSlaterDet(gradSlaterDet* G, double alpha, double beta, double gamma)
00098 {
00099   double euler[3] = { alpha, beta, gamma };
00100 
00101   complex double R2[2][2];
00102   rotatemat2(euler, R2);
00103 
00104   double R3[3][3];
00105   rotatemat3(euler, R3);
00106   
00107   int i;
00108   for (i=0; i<G->ngauss; i++)
00109     rotategradGaussian(&G->gradval[i], R3, R2);
00110 
00111 }

00134 
00135 void calcgradSlaterDetAux(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00136                           gradSlaterDetAux* dX)
00137 {
00138   int A=Q->A; int ngauss=Q->ngauss; 
00139   int* idx=Q->idx; int* ng=Q->ng;
00140   Gaussian* G=Q->G;
00141   GaussianAux* Gaux=X->Gaux;
00142   complex double* o=X->o;
00143   gradGaussianAux* dGaux=dX->dGaux;
00144   gradGaussian* dno=dX->dno;
00145 
00146   int k,l,m,mi;
00147   gradGaussian dn;
00148 
00149   for (l=0; l<ngauss; l++)
00150     for (k=0; k<ngauss; k++)
00151       calcgradGaussianAux(&G[k], &G[l], &Gaux[k+l*ngauss],
00152                           &dGaux[k+l*ngauss]);
00153 
00154   for (l=0; l<A; l++)
00155     for (k=0; k<ngauss; k++)
00156       zerogradGaussian(&dno[k+l*ngauss]);
00157 
00158   for (m=0; m<A; m++)
00159     for (k=0; k<ngauss; k++) {
00160       zerogradGaussian(&dn);
00161       for (mi=0; mi<ng[m]; mi++)
00162         addtogradGaussian(&dn, &dGaux[k+(idx[m]+mi)*ngauss].dQ);
00163       for (l=0; l<A; l++)
00164         addmulttogradGaussian(&dno[k+l*ngauss], &dn, o[m+l*A]);
00165     }
00166 }

00168 
00169 void calcgradSlaterDetAuxod(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00170                             const SlaterDetAux* X,
00171                             gradSlaterDetAux* dX)
00172 {
00173   int A=Q->A; int ngauss=Q->ngauss; 
00174   int* idx=Q->idx; int* idxp=Qp->idx;
00175   int* ng=Q->ng; int* ngp=Qp->ng;
00176   Gaussian* G=Q->G; Gaussian* Gp=Qp->G;
00177   GaussianAux* Gaux=X->Gaux;
00178   complex double* o=X->o;
00179   gradGaussianAux* dGaux=dX->dGaux;
00180   gradGaussian* dno=dX->dno;
00181 
00182   int k,ki,l,li,m,mi;
00183   gradGaussian dn;
00184 
00185   for (l=0; l<A; l++)
00186     for (li=0; li<ngp[l]; li++)
00187       for (k=0; k<A; k++)
00188         for (ki=0; ki<ng[k]; ki++)
00189           calcgradGaussianAux(&G[idx[k]+ki], &Gp[idxp[l]+li], 
00190                               &Gaux[(idx[k]+ki)+(idxp[l]+li)*ngauss],
00191                               &dGaux[(idx[k]+ki)+(idxp[l]+li)*ngauss]);
00192 
00193   for (l=0; l<A; l++)
00194     for (k=0; k<ngauss; k++)
00195       zerogradGaussian(&dno[k+l*ngauss]);
00196 
00197   for (m=0; m<A; m++)
00198     for (k=0; k<ngauss; k++) {
00199       zerogradGaussian(&dn);
00200       for (mi=0; mi<ngp[m]; mi++)
00201         addtogradGaussian(&dn, &dGaux[k+(idxp[m]+mi)*ngauss].dQ);
00202       for (l=0; l<A; l++)
00203         addmulttogradGaussian(&dno[k+l*ngauss], &dn, o[m+l*A]);
00204     }
00205 }

00207 
00208 void calcgradOvlapod(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp,
00209                      const SlaterDetAux* X, const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00210                      gradSlaterDet* grad)
00211 {
00212   int A=Q->A; int ngauss=Q->ngauss;
00213   int* idx = Q->idx; int* ng = Q->ng;
00214   gradGaussian* dno = dX->dno;
00215   gradGaussian* dval = grad->gradval;
00216   complex double ovl = X->ovlap;
00217 
00218   int k,ki;
00219 
00220   grad->ngauss = Q->ngauss;
00221   zerogradSlaterDet(grad);
00222 
00223   for (k=0; k<A; k++)
00224     for (ki=0; ki<ng[k]; ki++)
00225       addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[k]+ki], &dno[(idx[k]+ki)+k*ngauss], 
00226                             ovl);
00227 
00228   grad->val = ovl;
00229 }

00231 
00232 void calcgradSlaterDetOBME(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00233                            const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00234                            const gradOneBodyOperator* op, 
00235                            gradSlaterDet* grad)
00236 {
00237   int A=Q->A; int ngauss=Q->ngauss; 
00238   int* idx = Q->idx; int* ng = Q->ng;
00239   Gaussian* G=Q->G;
00240   GaussianAux* Gaux=X->Gaux;
00241   complex double* o=X->o;
00242   gradGaussianAux* dGaux=dX->dGaux;
00243   gradGaussian* dno=dX->dno;
00244   complex double* val = &grad->val; gradGaussian* dval = grad->gradval;
00245 
00246   int k,l,s,ki,li,si;
00247   complex double gval;
00248   gradGaussian gdval;
00249 
00250   for (l=0; l<A; l++)
00251     for (k=0; k<A; k++)
00252       if (!op->opt || Gaux[idx[k]+idx[l]*ngauss].T) {
00253         gval = 0.0;
00254         for (ki=0; ki<ng[k]; ki++) {
00255           zerogradGaussian(&gdval);
00256           for (li=0; li<ng[l]; li++) {
00257             op->me(op->par, 
00258                    &G[idx[k]+ki], &G[idx[l]+li], 
00259                    &Gaux[(idx[k]+ki)+(idx[l]+li)*ngauss],
00260                    &dGaux[(idx[k]+ki)+(idx[l]+li)*ngauss],
00261                    &gval, &gdval);
00262           }
00263           addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[k]+ki], &gdval, o[l+k*A]); 
00264         }
00265         *val += gval*o[l+k*A];
00266         for (s=0; s<A; s++)
00267           for (si=0; si<ng[s]; si++)
00268             addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[s]+si], &dno[(idx[s]+si)+k*ngauss],
00269                                   -gval*o[l+s*A]);
00270       }
00271 }

00273 
00274 void calcgradSlaterDetOBMEod(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00275                              const SlaterDetAux* X,
00276                              const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00277                              const gradOneBodyOperator* op, 
00278                              gradSlaterDet* grad)
00279 {
00280   int A=Q->A; int ngauss=Q->ngauss; 
00281   int* idx = Q->idx; int* idxp = Qp->idx;
00282   int* ng = Q->ng; int* ngp = Qp->ng;
00283   Gaussian* G=Q->G; Gaussian* Gp=Qp->G;
00284   GaussianAux* Gaux=X->Gaux;
00285   complex double* o=X->o;
00286   gradGaussianAux* dGaux=dX->dGaux;
00287   gradGaussian* dno=dX->dno;
00288   complex double ovl = X->ovlap;
00289   complex double val; gradGaussian* dval = grad->gradval;
00290 
00291   int k,l,s,ki,li,si;
00292   complex double gval;
00293   gradGaussian gdval;
00294 
00295   val = 0.0;
00296   for (l=0; l<A; l++)
00297     for (k=0; k<A; k++)
00298       if (!op->opt || Gaux[idx[k]+idxp[l]*ngauss].T) {
00299         gval = 0.0;
00300         for (ki=0; ki<ng[k]; ki++) {
00301           zerogradGaussian(&gdval);
00302           for (li=0; li<ngp[l]; li++) {
00303             op->me(op->par, 
00304                    &G[idx[k]+ki], &Gp[idxp[l]+li], 
00305                    &Gaux[(idx[k]+ki)+(idxp[l]+li)*ngauss],
00306                    &dGaux[(idx[k]+ki)+(idxp[l]+li)*ngauss],
00307                    &gval, &gdval);
00308           }
00309           addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[k]+ki], &gdval, o[l+k*A]*ovl); 
00310         }
00311         val += gval*o[l+k*A]*ovl;
00312         for (s=0; s<A; s++)
00313           for (si=0; si<ng[s]; si++)
00314             addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[s]+si], &dno[(idx[s]+si)+k*ngauss],
00315                                   -gval*o[l+s*A]*ovl);
00316       }
00317 
00318   grad->val += val;
00319 
00320   // this term is comming from the derivative of the overlap
00321   for (k=0; k<A; k++)
00322     for (ki=0; ki<ng[k]; ki++)
00323       addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[k]+ki], &dno[(idx[k]+ki)+k*ngauss], val);
00324 }

00326 
00327 void calcgradSlaterDetTBME(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00328                            const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00329                            const gradTwoBodyOperator* op, 
00330                            gradSlaterDet* grad)
00331 {
00332   int A=Q->A; int ngauss=Q->ngauss; 
00333   int* idx = Q->idx; int* ng = Q->ng;
00334   Gaussian* G=Q->G;
00335   GaussianAux* Gaux=X->Gaux;
00336   complex double* o=X->o;
00337   gradGaussianAux* dGaux=dX->dGaux;
00338   gradGaussian* dno=dX->dno;
00339   complex double* val = &grad->val; gradGaussian* dval = grad->gradval;
00340 
00341   int k,l,m,n,s, ki,li,mi,ni,si;
00342   complex double gval;
00343   gradGaussian gdval;
00344   complex double ooa;
00345 
00346   for (n=0; n<A; n++)
00347     for (l=0; l<A; l++)
00348       if (!op->opt || Gaux[idx[l]+idx[n]*ngauss].T) {
00349         for (m=0; m<A; m++)
00350           for (k=0; k<A; k++)
00351             if (!op->opt || Gaux[idx[k]+idx[m]*ngauss].T) {
00352 
00353               ooa = o[m+k*A]*o[n+l*A]-o[n+k*A]*o[m+l*A];
00354 
00355               gval = 0.0;
00356 
00357               for (ki=0; ki<ng[k]; ki++) {
00358                 zerogradGaussian(&gdval);
00359                 for (ni=0; ni<ng[n]; ni++)
00360                   for (li=0; li<ng[l]; li++)
00361                     for (mi=0; mi<ng[m]; mi++)
00362 
00363                       op->me(op->par, 
00364                              &G[idx[k]+ki], &G[idx[l]+li], 
00365                              &G[idx[m]+mi], &G[idx[n]+ni], 
00366                              &Gaux[(idx[k]+ki)+(idx[m]+mi)*ngauss],
00367                              &Gaux[(idx[l]+li)+(idx[n]+ni)*ngauss],
00368                              &dGaux[(idx[k]+ki)+(idx[m]+mi)*ngauss],
00369                              &gval, &gdval);
00370 
00371                 addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[k]+ki], &gdval, ooa);
00372               }
00373               *val += 0.5*gval*ooa;
00374 
00375               for (s=0; s<A; s++) {
00376                 ooa = o[m+s*A]*o[n+l*A]-o[n+s*A]*o[m+l*A];
00377                 for (si=0; si<ng[s]; si++)
00378                   addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[s]+si], 
00379                                         &dno[(idx[s]+si)+k*ngauss],
00380                                         -gval*ooa);
00381               }
00382             }
00383       }
00384 }

00387 void calcgradSlaterDetTBMEod(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00388                              const SlaterDetAux* X,
00389                              const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00390                              const gradTwoBodyOperator* op, 
00391                              gradSlaterDet* grad)
00392 {
00393   int A=Q->A; int ngauss=Q->ngauss; 
00394   int* idx = Q->idx; int* idxp = Qp->idx; 
00395   int* ng = Q->ng; int* ngp = Qp->ng;
00396   Gaussian* G=Q->G; Gaussian* Gp=Qp->G;
00397   GaussianAux* Gaux=X->Gaux;
00398   complex double* o=X->o;
00399   gradGaussianAux* dGaux=dX->dGaux;
00400   gradGaussian* dno=dX->dno;
00401   complex double val; gradGaussian* dval = grad->gradval;
00402   complex double ovl = X->ovlap;
00403 
00404   int k,l,m,n,s, ki,li,mi,ni,si;
00405   complex double gval;
00406   gradGaussian gdval;
00407   complex double ooa;
00408 
00409   val = 0.0;
00410   for (n=0; n<A; n++)
00411     for (l=0; l<A; l++)
00412       if (!op->opt || Gaux[idx[l]+idxp[n]*ngauss].T) {
00413         for (m=0; m<A; m++)
00414           for (k=0; k<A; k++)
00415             if (!op->opt || Gaux[idx[k]+idxp[m]*ngauss].T) {
00416 
00417               ooa = o[m+k*A]*o[n+l*A]-o[n+k*A]*o[m+l*A];
00418 
00419               gval = 0.0;
00420 
00421               for (ki=0; ki<ng[k]; ki++) {
00422                 zerogradGaussian(&gdval);
00423                 for (ni=0; ni<ngp[n]; ni++)
00424                   for (li=0; li<ng[l]; li++)
00425                     for (mi=0; mi<ngp[m]; mi++)
00426 
00427                       op->me(op->par, 
00428                              &G[idx[k]+ki], &G[idx[l]+li], 
00429                              &Gp[idxp[m]+mi], &Gp[idxp[n]+ni], 
00430                              &Gaux[(idx[k]+ki)+(idxp[m]+mi)*ngauss],
00431                              &Gaux[(idx[l]+li)+(idxp[n]+ni)*ngauss],
00432                              &dGaux[(idx[k]+ki)+(idxp[m]+mi)*ngauss],
00433                              &gval, &gdval);
00434 
00435                 addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[k]+ki], &gdval, ooa*ovl);
00436               }
00437               val += 0.5*gval*ooa*ovl;
00438 
00439               for (s=0; s<A; s++) {
00440                 ooa = o[m+s*A]*o[n+l*A]-o[n+s*A]*o[m+l*A];
00441                 for (si=0; si<ng[s]; si++)
00442                   addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[s]+si], 
00443                                         &dno[(idx[s]+si)+k*ngauss],
00444                                         -gval*ooa*ovl);
00445               }
00446             }
00447       } 
00448 
00449   grad->val += val;
00450 
00451   // this term is comming from the derivative of the overlap
00452   for (k=0; k<A; k++)
00453     for (ki=0; ki<ng[k]; ki++)
00454       addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[k]+ki], &dno[(idx[k]+ki)+k*ngauss], val);
00455 }

00458 void calcgradSlaterDetTBMErowcol(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDetAux* X,
00459                                  const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00460                                  const gradTwoBodyOperator* op, 
00461                                  gradSlaterDet* grad,
00462                                  int k, int l)
00463 {
00464   int A=Q->A; int ngauss=Q->ngauss; 
00465   int* idx = Q->idx; int* ng = Q->ng;
00466   Gaussian* G=Q->G;
00467   GaussianAux* Gaux=X->Gaux;
00468   complex double* o=X->o;
00469   gradGaussianAux* dGaux=dX->dGaux;
00470   gradGaussian* dno=dX->dno;
00471   complex double* val = &grad->val; gradGaussian* dval = grad->gradval;
00472 
00473   int m,n,s, ki,li,mi,ni,si;
00474   complex double gval;
00475   gradGaussian gdval;
00476   complex double ooa;
00477 
00478   // zero gradient, as each k,l component is calculated independendly
00479   *val = 0.0;
00480   for (ki=0; ki<ngauss; ki++)
00481     zerogradGaussian(&dval[ki]);
00482 
00483   for (n=0; n<A; n++)
00484     // for (l=0; l<A; l++)
00485       if (!op->opt || Gaux[idx[l]+idx[n]*ngauss].T) {
00486         for (m=0; m<A; m++)
00487           // for (k=0; k<A; k++)
00488             if (!op->opt || Gaux[idx[k]+idx[m]*ngauss].T) {
00489 
00490               ooa = o[m+k*A]*o[n+l*A]-o[n+k*A]*o[m+l*A];
00491 
00492               gval = 0.0;
00493 
00494               for (ki=0; ki<ng[k]; ki++) {
00495                 zerogradGaussian(&gdval);
00496                 for (ni=0; ni<ng[n]; ni++)
00497                   for (li=0; li<ng[l]; li++)
00498                     for (mi=0; mi<ng[m]; mi++)
00499 
00500                       op->me(op->par, 
00501                              &G[idx[k]+ki], &G[idx[l]+li], 
00502                              &G[idx[m]+mi], &G[idx[n]+ni], 
00503                              &Gaux[(idx[k]+ki)+(idx[m]+mi)*ngauss],
00504                              &Gaux[(idx[l]+li)+(idx[n]+ni)*ngauss],
00505                              &dGaux[(idx[k]+ki)+(idx[m]+mi)*ngauss],
00506                              &gval, &gdval);
00507 
00508                 addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[k]+ki], &gdval, ooa);
00509               }
00510               *val += 0.5*gval*ooa;
00511 
00512               for (s=0; s<A; s++) {
00513                 ooa = o[m+s*A]*o[n+l*A] - o[n+s*A]*o[m+l*A];
00514                 for (si=0; si<ng[s]; si++)
00515                   addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[s]+si], 
00516                                         &dno[(idx[s]+si)+k*ngauss],
00517                                         -gval*ooa);
00518               }
00519             }
00520       }
00521 }

00524 void calcgradSlaterDetTBMEodrowcol(const SlaterDet* Q, const SlaterDet* Qp, 
00525                                    const SlaterDetAux* X,
00526                                    const gradSlaterDetAux* dX,
00527                                    const gradTwoBodyOperator* op, 
00528                                    gradSlaterDet* grad,
00529                                    int k, int l)
00530 {
00531   int A=Q->A; int ngauss=Q->ngauss; 
00532   int* idx = Q->idx; int* idxp = Qp->idx; 
00533   int* ng = Q->ng; int* ngp = Qp->ng;
00534   Gaussian* G=Q->G; Gaussian* Gp=Qp->G;
00535   GaussianAux* Gaux=X->Gaux;
00536   complex double* o=X->o;
00537   gradGaussianAux* dGaux=dX->dGaux;
00538   gradGaussian* dno=dX->dno;
00539   complex double val; gradGaussian* dval = grad->gradval;
00540   complex double ovl = X->ovlap;
00541 
00542   int m,n,s, ki,li,mi,ni,si;
00543   complex double gval;
00544   gradGaussian gdval;
00545   complex double ooa;
00546 
00547   // zero gradient
00548   grad->val = 0.0;
00549   for (si=0; si<ngauss; si++)
00550     zerogradGaussian(&dval[si]);
00551 
00552   val = 0.0;
00553   for (n=0; n<A; n++)
00554     // for (l=0; l<A; l++)
00555       if (!op->opt || Gaux[idx[l]+idxp[n]*ngauss].T) {
00556         for (m=0; m<A; m++)
00557           // for (k=0; k<A; k++)
00558             if (!op->opt || Gaux[idx[k]+idxp[m]*ngauss].T) {
00559 
00560               ooa = o[m+k*A]*o[n+l*A]-o[n+k*A]*o[m+l*A];
00561 
00562               gval = 0.0;
00563 
00564               for (ki=0; ki<ng[k]; ki++) {
00565                 zerogradGaussian(&gdval);
00566                 for (ni=0; ni<ngp[n]; ni++)
00567                   for (li=0; li<ng[l]; li++)
00568                     for (mi=0; mi<ngp[m]; mi++)
00569                       op->me(op->par, 
00570                              &G[idx[k]+ki], &G[idx[l]+li], 
00571                              &Gp[idxp[m]+mi], &Gp[idxp[n]+ni], 
00572                              &Gaux[(idx[k]+ki)+(idxp[m]+mi)*ngauss],
00573                              &Gaux[(idx[l]+li)+(idxp[n]+ni)*ngauss],
00574                              &dGaux[(idx[k]+ki)+(idxp[m]+mi)*ngauss],
00575                              &gval, &gdval);
00576 
00577                 addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[k]+ki], &gdval, ooa*ovl);
00578               }
00579               val += 0.5*gval*ooa*ovl;
00580 
00581               for (s=0; s<A; s++) {
00582                 ooa = o[m+s*A]*o[n+l*A]-o[n+s*A]*o[m+l*A];
00583                 for (si=0; si<ng[s]; si++)
00584                   addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[s]+si], 
00585                                         &dno[(idx[s]+si)+k*ngauss],
00586                                         -gval*ooa*ovl);
00587               }
00588             }
00589       } 
00590 
00591   grad->val += val;
00592 
00593   // this term is comming from the derivative of the overlap
00594   for (s=0; s<A; s++)
00595     for (si=0; si<ng[s]; si++)
00596       addmulttogradGaussian(&dval[idx[s]+si], &dno[(idx[s]+si)+s*ngauss], val);
00597 }
Generated on Tue Dec 4 2012 14:05:34 for FMD by  1.7.1
